notes: This is the Czech data collected during the `VYSTADIAL` project. It is an extension of the 'Vystadial 2013' Czech part data release. The dataset comprises of telephone conversations in Czech, developed for training acoustic models for automatic speech recognition in spoken dialogue systems.
